about_the_game:
This is a free version of the Alaska Solitaire card game from our popular Classic Card Games Collection. If you want to play more games like this then get our Classic Card Game Collection with over 150 different solitaire card games.



One of the Best Classic Card Games
Alaska Solitaire is a very popular classic card game that has been enjoyed by millions of people. We wanted to bring you our version of this game from our Classic Card Game Collection completely free.

Choose Your Style
Customize the look of your game to add even more fun to your playing experience with many different card designs, backgrounds and win animations. There is a whole range of different colors, seasonal designs, popular holiday designs like Christmas designs and so much more. Make the game look as awesome as you want and have even more fun playing.

Features of Classic Card Games Collection
- Rules provided
- Customization of appearance with hd backgrounds and cards
- Smooth Functionality
- Unlimited undo and redo

You just can't beat the Classics
Alaska Solitaire is a classic card game that has stood the test of time due to it's strategic and fun gameplay.

Enjoy
Hope you guys enjoy the game and if you want more feel free to check out our other classic card games or get our classic card games collection for a huge range of classic card games with over 200 games including lots of popular ones such as Klondike, Spider, Pyramid, FreeCell, Tri Peaks and so many more.

name: Alaska Solitaire Classic Card Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit / Windows 10 64 bit / Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or AMD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit / Windows 10 64 bit / Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or AMD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Enjoy playing Alaska Solitaire from the #1 Classic Card Game Collection for free. Customize your game with awesome card designs, backgrounds and win animations adding even more fun to this classic game.
